instruction: Medication: Combined estrogen-progestin oral contraceptive pill with 20 micrograms of ethinyl estradiol and 100 micrograms of levonorgestrel. Directions: Swallow one tablet every day with the first snack after the night shift, no breaks. Start tonight even if bleeding. Dosage: 20 micrograms of ethinyl estradiol and 100 micrograms of levonorgestrel per tablet. Duration: Continuous use.

attributes.sig: Take 1 tablet by mouth daily at the same time each day, continuously without a break between packs.
attributes.note_to_pharmacist: Dispense a total of 14 packs to cover a 365-day supply.

instruction: Set an alarm to ensure daily dosing of the contraceptive pill.

attributes.comment: Set an alarm to ensure daily dosing of the contraceptive pill.

instruction: Do not stretch or split packs of the contraceptive pill; maintain steady daily dosing.

attributes.comment: Do not stretch or split packs of the contraceptive pill; maintain steady daily dosing.

instruction: Watch for side effects: mild nausea, breast soreness, and tiny brown spotting in the first two months. Seek emergency care for sharp calf pain or crushing chest pressure.

coding.display: Advice to report signs and symptoms

attributes.comment: Watch for side effects: mild nausea, breast soreness, and tiny brown spotting in the first two months. Seek emergency care for sharp calf pain or crushing chest pressure.

instruction: Keep a backup pad handy. If flow is soaking through hourly by week eight, contact the clinician through the portal.

attributes.comment: Keep a backup pad handy. If flow is soaking through hourly by week eight, contact the clinician through the portal.

instruction: Take one contraceptive pill within a three-hour window. If missed, take one immediately but never double doses.

attributes.comment: Take one contraceptive pill within a three-hour window. If missed, take one immediately but never double doses.
